Template.HtmlPart:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Dolt {{format}} {{version}} Performance Results</title>
  <style>
    table {
      border: 1px solid black;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
      font-family: sans-serif;
      font-size: .8rem;
      padding: 5px;
      margin: 5px;
    }
    th {
      border: 1px solid rgb(190, 190, 190);
      padding: 10px;
    }
    td {
      padding: 5px;
    }
    tr:nth-child(even) {background-color: #f2f2f2;}
  </style>
</head><body>{{results}}</body></html>
